definition: bamboo fish trap/used in names of places connected with Shantou 汕頭|汕头[Shan4 tou2]
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: With the case study of Shantou University library, it also provides related experiences.
sentences.chinese: 案例分析汕头大学数字图书馆门户的建设实践。

sentences.english: If I hadn't gone to Shantou University, I wouldn't have move to Shantou.
sentences.chinese: 如果我没有考上汕头大学，我就不用搬到汕头去了。

sentences.english: The shantou university，which covered in the thick spring scenery，is a very beautiful place.
sentences.chinese: 覆盖在浓浓春色里的汕头大学，美不胜收。

sentences.english: The Medical College of Shantou University has practised effectively.
sentences.chinese: 汕头大学医学院在此进行了有效的实践。

sentences.english: Sponsored by Li Ka Shing Foundation and the Shantou University.
sentences.chinese: 是次讲座由李嘉诚基金及汕头大学赞助。

sentences.english: SETTING: Department of Anesthesiology, First Hospital Affiliated to Shantou University.
sentences.chinese: 单位汕头大学医学院第一附属医院麻醉科。

definition: Jinan University in Guangdong Province, with 4 campuses in Guangzhou, Shenzhen and Zhuhai
Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists
